name: Close Your Eyes (itch) (Weston Bell-Geddes)
description:
Close Your Eyes is an experiment with choice-driven narrative in virtual reality.

Controls

Sitting VR (Oclus Rift, HTC Vive, Windows Mixed Reality)

Use the trigger to grip objects
